mapper.sql: id, user_id, order_id, period_num, deadline, status, created_at, updated_at, pay_id, price, extra, invoice_status, invoice_id
mapper.select: SELECT b.`company_name`,a.created_at,a.`deadline`,c.`end_date`,a.`id`,a.`invoice_id`,a.`invoice_status`,c.`left_periods_price` as 'leftPeriodsPrices', a.`order_id`,c.`price` AS 'order_price',c.`package_id`,a.`pay_id`,a.`period_num`,c.`periods_price`,a.`price`,d.`name` AS 'sku_name' ,e.`name` AS 'spu_name',c.`start_date`,a.`status`,a.`updated_at`,a.`user_id` FROM `bill` a LEFT JOIN `risk_info` b ON a.`user_id`=b.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `order` c ON a.`order_id`=c.`id` LEFT JOIN `sku` d ON c.`product_id`=d.`id` LEFT JOIN `spu` e ON d.`spu_id`=e.`id` WHERE a.`user_id`=#{userid}
